snippet: Liverpool have signed centre back Ragnar Klavan from Bundesliga side Augsburg on a long-term contract, the Premier League side said on Wednesday....

headline.main: Liverpool Sign Centre Back Klavan From Augsburg
headline.print_headline: Liverpool Sign Centre Back Klavan From Augsburg

lead_paragraph: Liverpool have signed centre back Ragnar Klavan from Bundesliga side Augsburg on a long-term contract, the Premier League side said on Wednesday.

snippet: Swansea City must create more chances or they will struggle in the Premier League, manager Francesco Guidolin said after their 1-0 defeat at Southampton on Sunday....

headline.main: Toothless Swansea Must Make More Chances, Says Guidolin
headline.print_headline: Toothless Swansea Must Make More Chances, Says Guidolin

lead_paragraph: Swansea City must create more chances or they will struggle in the Premier League, manager Francesco Guidolin said after their 1-0 defeat at Southampton on Sunday.

snippet: Manchester United need to end their trophy drought by winning either the Europa League or the FA Cup and finish in the Premier League's top four this season to get the fans back on board, captain Wayne Rooney said....

headline.main: United Need to Win Trophy to Save Season, Says Rooney
headline.print_headline: United Need to Win Trophy to Save Season, Says Rooney

lead_paragraph: Manchester United need to end their trophy drought by winning either the Europa League or the FA Cup and finish in the Premier League's top four this season to get the fans back on board, captain Wayne Rooney said.

snippet: West Ham United's Senegalese striker Diafra Sakho has been ruled out for up to eight weeks because of an ongoing back injury and will miss next month's African Nations Cup....

headline.main: West Ham Striker Sakho to Miss African Nations Cup
headline.print_headline: West Ham Striker Sakho to Miss African Nations Cup

lead_paragraph: West Ham United's Senegalese striker Diafra Sakho has been ruled out for up to eight weeks because of an ongoing back injury and will miss next month's African Nations Cup.

snippet: Manchester United striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic would have preferred a victory for his team to scoring a goal in the 1-1 draw against Everton in the Premier League on Sunday....

headline.main: I'd Prefer to Win Game Than Score, Says Zlatan
headline.print_headline: I'd Prefer to Win Game Than Score, Says Zlatan

lead_paragraph: Manchester United striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic would have preferred a victory for his team to scoring a goal in the 1-1 draw against Everton in the Premier League on Sunday.

snippet: Burnley have completed the club-record signing of Belgian international midfielder Steven Defour from Anderlecht, the Premier League side confirmed on Tuesday....
lead_paragraph: Burnley have completed the club-record signing of Belgian international midfielder Steven Defour from Anderlecht, the Premier League side confirmed on Tuesday.

snippet: West Ham United striker Diafra Sakho is set for a six-week spell on the sidelines after injuring his thigh in Sunday's 1-1 Premier League draw at Manchester United....

headline.main: West Ham's Sakho Out for Six Weeks With Thigh Injury
headline.print_headline: West Ham's Sakho Out for Six Weeks With Thigh Injury

lead_paragraph: West Ham United striker Diafra Sakho is set for a six-week spell on the sidelines after injuring his thigh in Sunday's 1-1 Premier League draw at Manchester United.

snippet: Chelsea and Manchester City have been fined 100,000 pounds and 35,000 pounds respectively for failing to control their players during a Premier League encounter on Dec. 3, the FA said on Tuesday....

headline.main: Chelsea and Man City Fined for Fracas
headline.print_headline: Chelsea and Man City Fined for Fracas

lead_paragraph: Chelsea and Manchester City have been fined 100,000 pounds and 35,000 pounds respectively for failing to control their players during a Premier League encounter on Dec. 3, the FA said on Tuesday.

snippet: Michy Batshuayi will be ready to grab his chance if selected to replace the suspended Diego Costa for Chelsea's Boxing Day clash with Bournemouth in the Premier League, said midfielder Nemanja Matic....

headline.main: Matic Backs Batshuayi to Fill In for Costa
headline.print_headline: Matic Backs Batshuayi to Fill In for Costa

lead_paragraph: Michy Batshuayi will be ready to grab his chance if selected to replace the suspended Diego Costa for Chelsea's Boxing Day clash with Bournemouth in the Premier League, said midfielder Nemanja Matic.

snippet: Arsenal shoved Chelsea off the top of the table but Leicester City's Jamie Vardy, with a dazzling hat-trick, was the man of the moment on Saturday as the struggling Premier League champions blew aside Manchester City 4-2....

headline.main: Arsenal Go Top, Vardy Hat-Trick Lights Up Leicester
headline.print_headline: Arsenal Go Top, Vardy Hat-Trick Lights Up Leicester

lead_paragraph: Arsenal shoved Chelsea off the top of the table but Leicester City's Jamie Vardy, with a dazzling hat-trick, was the man of the moment on Saturday as the struggling Premier League champions blew aside Manchester City 4-2.
